Master Module¶

..module:: master :platform Unix :synopsis: Python module for managing the robot to the target ..moduleauthor:: Bauyrzhan Zhakanov <bauyrzhan.zhakanov@gmail.com>

Service:
/master
master.main()¶

This function used to choose the driving mode by user The user message is passed to the service master
